My quarantine:

poco meno di 1 minuto per leggerlo - March 23rd , 2020 by Davide

Hi, sorry but this post will be very very short with some key points about my future task. This is absolutely my first post in English on this blog and I would like to tell you what I am going to do during this quarantine due to Coronavirus.

I am in Italy and the entire country is in lockdown and we must to stay at home to avoid the diffusion of the virus. My mood isnâ€™t very well but I am trying to focus on something new to enhance it.

What I am going to do

I am trying to building something to relaunch my job and my jurney. Everything will be expressed by a task list

  • Launch spacedcards.com around Anki fields
  • Develop new site for my company Sprint Studio
  • Write more post on this blog documenting my journey
  • Read more books, I hope to read two books during this time
  • Grow my English skills and my vocabulary
Sentiti lib!
